label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_012
content:

#### signer-01
- CPU Percentage: 46
- Memory Percentage: 78
- Disk Used Percentage: 61
- Net In (Mbps): 19
- Net Out (Mbps): 24
- HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 63
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

### Events
- Cloud sync controller applied a delayed batch after maintenance window; observed temporary propagation p95 increase; verified eventual consistency across edges.
- Two zones showed SOA serial mismatch after concurrent edits in git and manual console change; enforced change policy: console edits disabled for production projects.
- Lint detected 6 issues after importing partner-managed subzones; corrected NS target formatting and removed duplicate TXT segments.
- Created new dashboard for transfer latency and TSIG failures; set alerts on p95 > 1800ms and failures > 2 per hour.

### On Call
- Shift: C. Martinez
- Pages: 2
- Tickets: 7
- Status: Stable
- Notes: Addressed process gap around console edits and improved observability.
